pli-tv-pvr1.3:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.1: For having sexual intercourse, how many failures, among the four kinds, does one have a share in?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.2: For having sexual intercourse, one has a share in two out of four kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.3: one may have failure in morality;  one may have failure in conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.1: For, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, how many failures, among the four kinds, does one have a share in?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.2: For, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, one has a share in one out of four kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr1.3:3.1: The third section on failure is finished.
